name: Brew Competition Online Entry & Mgmt.
short_description:
May 18, 2015: BJCP 2015 Styles Integration Coming Soon

Support for the new BJCP 2015 style guidelines nearly complete. Although testing is going well, further testing is needed to fully integrate them into the BCOE&M core, especially since the BJCP changed the category numbering system to differentiate beer, mead, and cider styles in the official versions of each released earlier this month.

The BJCP fully expects that a "transition period" will be necessary for competitions for the rest of 2015. If you want to use BCOE&M for your competition, it is acceptable to use the 2008 guidelines until the 2015 guidelines are integrated into the system.
The BJCP itself just published the official version of the 2015 BJCP Style Guidelines on May 5, 2015.

Stay tuned.
